title: The Cosmic Ordering Service
description: Cosmic Ordering has attracted many followers and believers. The Cosmos is able to help manifest your desires, but how do you go about placing your Order without it being turned against you, and how can you be sure you are heard? The best selling author of ‘Cosmic Ordering Guide’ and ‘Cosmic Ordering Connection’ Stephen Richards unveils the secrets of successfully placing your Order. Be careful what you wish for! Includes a Q & A section taken from real life questions, and 101 Orders for everyday use in clean language form that guarantees not to be misinterpreted by the Cosmos.
author: Stephen Richards
